newsitem.title: NETHERLANDS: Dutch police swoop on canalside crocodile.
newsitem.headline: Dutch police swoop on canalside crocodile.

text.p: Police said on Thursday they were called out by a shaken cyclist who told them he saw a crocodile basking on a path by a Dutch canal.
"Armed with a stout blanket one of the officers sneaked up on the animal and was able to overpower it very easily," the police said.
They added that an extremely realistic one-metre (three-foot) imitation crocodile was now being held at Brielle police station, near Rotterdam.
